          <title>
            <string language="en">Protein breaking to amino acids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Protein, das zu den Aminosäuren bricht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Protéine se cassant aux acides aminés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Proteína que quebra aos aminos-ácido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proteina che tagliato agli amminoacidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρωτεϊνικό σπάσιμο στα αμινοξέα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proteína que se rompe a los aminoácidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustrations shows the breaking down of proteins into amino acids which happens during digestion.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amino acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Digestion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">digestive system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">protein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stomach</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses zeigt Abbildungen der Proteine in 
Aminosäuren unten brechen, welches während der Verdauung geschieht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce les illustrations montre la décomposition des 
protéines dans des acides aminés ce qui se produit pendant la 
digestion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este as ilustrações mostram quebrar para baixo 
das proteínas em aminos-ácido qual acontece durante a digestão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo le illustrazioni mostra la suddivisione 
delle proteine negli amminoacidi quale accadono durante la digestione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν το χωρισμό των 
πρωτεϊνών σε αμινοξέα που συμβαίνει κατά τη διάρκεια της πέψης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este las ilustraciones muestran la subdivisión 
de proteínas en los aminoácidos cuáles suceden durante la 
digestión.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
